title: Hey there!
author: Jan Katzer
content: yeah hey welcome blog happy new year officially post i‚Äôve written am kind stoked website made did webdesign past learn html css actually created full assuming read completed (ot atleast ‚Äúworkinprogress‚Äôed‚Äù lol) published see bit unnerving completely honest interesting got grasp idea people interested say regard thing like shouting void bucket list that‚Äôs good obviously ‚Äì getting used blogging writing proper posts hope you‚Äôll find useful funny exactly publish set stone probably lately codingwise informational stuff likely won‚Äôt write neverending projects way long scope stopped madman queued imaginary content production pipeline squishy meatball head jekyll works git repository locally expect soonish anyways blog; don‚Äôt let waffling distract :fire:

title: Merry Christmas!
author: Jan Katzer
content: systemoutprintln("merry christmas everbody");

title: Kafka
author: Jan Katzer
content: morning gregor samsa woke troubled dreams found transformed bed horrible vermin lay armourlike back lifted head little see brown belly slightly domed divided arches stiff sections bedding hardly able cover ready slide moment legs pitifully thin compared size rest waved helplessly looked ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs happened me‚Äù thought wasn‚Äôt dream room proper human small peacefully four familiar walls collection textile samples spread table travelling salesman hung picture recently cut illustrated magazine housed nice gilded frame showed lady fitted fur hat boa sat upright raising heavy muff covered lower arm viewer turned look window dull weather
